author: hwright
msg: Use sha1 checksums in the Berkeley DB backend.  For motivation, see the log
(rep_read_baton): Add a context for the sha1 checksum.
(rep_read_get_baton, txn_body_read_rep): Calculate a sha1 checksum along with
(svn_fs_base__rep_contents): Calculate the correct kind of checksum.
(svn_fs_base__dag_finalize_edits): Only compare checksums of like kind.

author: arfrever
msg: Check version of libsvn_auth_(gnome_keyring|kwallet) before loading provider
(get_auth_provider): Check versions of dynamically loaded libraries. Rename

author: hwright
msg: Bring up-to-date with trunk, resolving conflicts along the way.

author: hwright
msg: Fix an error leak introduced in r33300.

author: hwright
msg: For Berkeley DB filesystems, don't allow deltification of revisions
which existed pre-forward-delta.  These revisions should be considered
immutable and "frozen".  If we start trying to deltify them, we could
get into infinite delta loops, which would make the delta combiner
(svn_fs_base__deltify): Check the metadata table to ensure the
revision we're attempting to deltify is deltifiable.
